Sakura no Onsen = Sakura Hot Spring........Kimochi~~~ urlLink urlLink

from right to left: meso; hikku; meso meso; MESO meso; egu egu! In brown letters: "meso meso sunna yo" Someone PLEASE tell me what this means....I think it's just a sound that they're making when they're sulking.... urlLink urlLink
Chopper is the animal king! This is a movie poster. urlLink urlLink
Kaizoku Ou attire, and Demon Zoro in front! urlLink urlLink
Full crew.....for now? I didn't read all of the manga yet...so I don't know why Robin joins Luffy. urlLink urlLink
Zoro and Luffy...hm....In the anime, Luffy seems as tall as Zoro...but I guess I was wrong! urlLink urlLink
Another group pic! urlLink urlLink
I like this picture....it looks like someone took a picture of a photograph. Now I know Sanji has six-packs too! muhahahah~ urlLink urlLink

minna in arabasta....hey...I thought sanji lost those glasses! urlLink urlLink

Nami and Vivi in Arabasta ~ and of course wearing Sanji's favourite dance girl costume. Sanji: "Dance girls are civilians too!!" urlLink urlLink
don't mess with this crew! urlLink urlLink
Everyone is in action...heehee...except Luffy...he's just eating ~O~ urlLink urlLink

this must be the same sofa and same signs that Sanji and Ussop were holding a few posts back....the "Funk" picture! I guess Luffy kicked everyone out hahaha....hey look at that mini "Going Merry"! urlLink urlLink
Nami's battle at Arlong Park! I love the Hawaiian-style shirt that Zoro wears during this arc~ urlLink urlLink
lmao....this is so funny!!! The bear is so cute!!....all the skull needs now is a mugiwara boshi! urlLink urlLink
oh...I had more from the artbook that I forgot to post....Here is an earlier crew, without Sanji, Chopper or Robin. urlLink urlLink

Another "to die for" cute picture!!.....Tottemo tottemo kawaiiii! urlLink urlLink
UWAAAA...KAWAIIIIII ~~~ Young Mugiwara nakama with Shanks! urlLink urlLink

Wanted!! Bounty posters as background! Luffy is first to get a bounty of 30,000,000 Belis....next one on the wanted list will be Zoro at 60,000,000 Belis while Luffy's bounty raises to 100,000,000 Belis!! urlLink urlLink
Mugiwara Kaizoku symbol on barrels! Cool glasses on Sanji! urlLink urlLink
Another casual attire pic...this time with Carue and Vivi-chan! hey..zoro looks like he's carrying a golf bag haahah~ urlLink urlLink
Great wallpaper~ a collage of screencaps from the anime! urlLink urlLink
The Journey! Chopper is so cute! I think this is from the artbook. urlLink urlLink
Casual clothes ^o^~ Zoro looks the best IMO! Sanji....ehm...no wonder they have a gazillion Yaoi pages on him....look at his shirt! That's so Yaoi....=_=" urlLink urlLink
Arlong and his merman VS. Ussop, Zoro, Luffy and Sanji urlLink urlLink
Cool Funky pic! It's kind of blurry though. urlLink urlLink
OMG...this is such a great picture!!!!! The essence of Luffy and male Nakama....they're all pigging out like the boars beside them hahaha~ Zoro looks so funny!!! urlLink urlLink
Inner Peace~~~~For some reason Ussop looks young in this pic. urlLink urlLink
A very lively picture...lots of colours....I guess they don't really need a musician after all hahaha...I love this picture...but then again...i like all of them ~teehee! urlLink urlLink
And "No Slack" picture....heehehe...look at Ussop dancing like an idiot at the back! Wou...Sanji looks so cool in this pic! urlLink urlLink
Here is the "Live a life of Ease" picture I was talking about earlier! urlLink urlLink
Cool wallpaper! This is actually a combination of 2 separate pictures. The one on top is the "No Slack" picture and the one on the bottom is "Ease". Very nice wallpaper!! urlLink urlLink
